section.title: Verifying a swift Partition Label

warning.para: For a system upgrade do NOT clear the label before starting the upgrade.

section.para: This topic describes how to check whether a device has a label on a partition.

section.title: Check Partition Label
section.para: To check whether a device has label on a partition, perform the following step:

step.para: Log on to the node and use the parted command:

The output lists all of the block devices. Following is an example output for /dev/sdc with a single partition and a label of c0a8f502h000. Because the partition has a label, if you are about to install and deploy the system, you must clear this label before starting the deployment. As part of the deployment process, the system will label the partition.
